about.name: Abdul Noushad Sheikh
about.headline: Welcome to my website!
bio: Welcome to my little piece of the digital galaxy! At core, I'm a tenacious innovator and an unchained technologist. My mission? To forge meaningful solutions to tackle the real-world challenges, trying to contribute back to the open-source community and striving to bring change one line of code at a time.

This website is my creative outlet, an ideal embodiment of my love for backend development, built to simulate Ubuntu shell experience. This is a CLI-based portal welcoming you to a walk-through in my professional landscape and personal projects. This interface, however, shall not just be a bridge to my world but a reflecting pool of how I present the making of technology accessible and enjoyable.

summary: I find my expertise in vast variety of programming languages and frameworks.
I also love working on and making use of, most of the cloud services that help me create programs and solution faster.

projects.name: JobsExplorer.in
projects.description: Designed a simple web app built to quickly find jobs in India. Search keywords and location to find job listings from 3 of the most popular job sites in India. I built JobsExplorer to help people search their desired jobs with ease and clarity.
projects.tech: NodeJS, Amazon Web Services, JQuery, NGiNX

projects.name: UNI Share.in
projects.description: Created a web application to help students share their books, projects and other academic related stuff with each other in a University Campus. In short, it's a University OLX.
projects.tech: Django, Amazon Web Services, Python, NGiNX, RDBMS

aboutDesktop.madeWith: Made with Love, Coffee, and Codex
